attributes.action: demand the reinstatement of the right to purchase a TV Licence at the Post Office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The right to buy your TV Licence at your local Post Office has been taken away, for many of us in rural communities this means a journey to a distant Pay Point. Is this a precursor instigated by government to assist in the closure of the vital local rural Post Office?
